value:
$WmMPID_総選挙リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|So we meet again. I guess that
means it's time for round two.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|We may be fighting because of some
contract, but the rush I get testing my
skills against another is all natural.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|I may not be as strong a fighter as my
father, but... I will give it my all!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|Prepare yourself. We strike as one!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_総選挙リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|It seems you've demonstrated your
strength enough. The contract has
been broken... Thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|Guess that means I owe you one. I'll
pay you back the next time I see you.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|Allow me to also—$k$pWait, could it be? Are you...
$Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Huh? You know
$Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|This is the first time we've met. But
we all had the same strange dream
before arriving in this world.$k$pCountless people wanted us here.
They were all calling our names.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|It's as he said. And standing at the
front of the crowd was none other
than $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|Yeah, $Nu... I
remember the name from my dream.
It stuck with me even after I woke up.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Could it have to do with the legendary
rite performed in that other world?$k$pIt's said Brave Heroes are born from
mankind's wishes. And for some
reason, $Nu...$k$p$EFace_Smile|I get the feeling it was the wishes of
you and yours that brought these
Brave Heroes to Askr.$k$p$Sbs150|
